actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States, under the program of aid to families with dependent children, to disregard from the income of certain stepparents an amount equal to the State's standard of need for the stepparent's new family.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to revise the treatment of income of the dependent child's stepparent considered in determining a family's need for AFDC.

titles.title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States, under the program of aid to families with dependent children, to disregard from the income of certain stepparents an amount equal to the State's standard of need for the stepparent's new family.
